scupper.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to ruin someone’s plans or chance of being successful – used especially in news reports
scupper.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Plans to build a private hospital have been scuppered after a government inquiry.
scupper.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to deliberately sink your own ship
scupper.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a hole in the side of a ship that allows water to flow back into the sea
